className.transform: const variants = { default: 'text-foreground hover:text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline', muted: 'text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground underline-offset-4 hover:underline', accent: 'text-accent hover:text-accent/80 underline-offset-4 hover:underline', destructive: 'text-destructive hover:text-destructive/80 underline-offset-4 hover:underline' }; const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('transition-colors duration-150', variants[data || 'default'], props.className)
